mapper.update:
UPDATE data_league_outstanding SET
data_league_outstanding.ContentUrl = #{ contentUrl },
data_league_outstanding.LeagueId = #{ leagueId },
data_league_outstanding.PlayerId = #{ playerId },
data_league_outstanding.JudgeId = #{ judgeId },
data_league_outstanding.FishId = #{ fishId },
data_league_outstanding.CoachId = #{ coachId },
data_league_outstanding.LineUp = #{ lineUp },
data_league_outstanding.LeagueName = #{ leagueName },
data_league_outstanding.PlayerName = #{ playerName },
data_league_outstanding.JudgeName = #{ judgeName },
data_league_outstanding.JudgeRegion = #{ judgeRegion },
data_league_outstanding.JudgeBirth = #{ judgeBirth },
data_league_outstanding.FishName = #{ fishName },
data_league_outstanding.CoachName = #{ coachName },
data_league_outstanding.Year = #{ year },
data_league_outstanding.PlayerReClubName = #{ playerReClubName },
data_league_outstanding.PlayerReClubLogo = #{ playerReClubLogo },
data_league_outstanding.PlayerNumber = #{ playerNumber },
data_league_outstanding.FishReClubName = #{ fishReClubName },
data_league_outstanding.FishReClubLogo = #{ fishReClubLogo },
data_league_outstanding.FishNumber = #{ fishNumber },
data_league_outstanding.CoachReClubName = #{ coachReClubName },
data_league_outstanding.CoachReClubLogo = #{ coachReClubLogo },
data_league_outstanding.CreatedAt = #{ createdAt },
data_league_outstanding.UpdatedAt = #{ updatedAt }
WHERE id= #{id}
